interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz
Review Date: 2020/11/03
Store: Kneipp
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love this stuff! It smells really refreshing. I'm into essential oils and it smells just like that...strong but invigorating. It comes out just like shaving cream foam. Scent lasts after you leave the bath/shower. 10/10 recommend
Review Title: Smells SO good!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} This does exactly what it's supposed to do! Easy to use, my feet are super soft afterwards. Charges quickly. Great choice! Works Wonderfully! Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} I am obsessed with face masks! These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They have no scent, which is a good thing. Each mask has 2 steps... 1st step is four contour pads for under eye and frown lines and 2nd step is a full sheet mask. It feels amazing on my face! It doesn't shift around at all. I leave it on for 30 minutes and then apply my nighttime moisturizer.

Relaxing to wear
My skin really felt more firm after I used it
Closed my pores

Overall, I really liked this mask. I have tried probably 100 different face masks in my life and this is definitely in my TOP 5. STOP and BUY THIS! GO! Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer leuxe {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'} When I first began using this I definitely broke out a little more on my chin. I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go! I can see and feel the difference. Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} I wanted to use this for a while before I wrote a review and I absolutely love this stuff! It goes on easily and absorbs well. I feel like my skin looks smoother. I defintely recommend it! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Bioken] Cera Silkway Salon Quality Hair Serum - Enriched Premium Argan Oil (1.7 fl oz) Bioken {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Argan Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Bioken', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '856312005529'} You know when you get your hair done and you leave the salon with your hair smelling amazing the rest of the day...that's what this serum is like! It smells so good. I use it when my hair is wet or when I am just refreshing it mid day. Love it! SMELLS AMAZING! Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} I don't normally like to use sheet masks, but I really like these. My face felt so soft and moisturized adter using them. I would buy these again I liked them so much. Love these sheet masks Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I love this stuff! It smells really refreshing. I'm into essential oils and it smells just like that...strong but invigorating. It comes out just like shaving cream foam. Scent lasts after you leave the bath/shower. 10/10 recommend Smells SO good!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user remains committed to effective personal care products, with an expanding focus on skin health while integrating unique bath products into their regimen. They continue to express satisfaction with product performance, contributing to their journey toward overall well-being.

- **Product Type Preference:** Alongside their strong interest in hair care oils and serums, they have embraced body care products, particularly those that enhance the bathing experience. Their recent acquisition of shower foams highlights a growing affinity for products that provide both aromatherapy and hydrating benefits.

- **Functionality Focus:** The user prioritizes products that offer visible results for skin hydration and overall sensory experiences. They appreciate items that deliver strong fragrances and refreshing sensations, reinforcing their need for indulgent self-care.

- **Convenience & Efficiency:** The ease of application remains a priority; they favor products that enhance their self-care routines without demanding extensive time or effort. The user continues to be drawn to products that allow for a seamless integration into their daily rituals.

- **Positive Experience:** Their recent interactions show a sustained trend of satisfaction with product efficacy, leading to enhanced skin smoothness and a refreshing feel post-use. 

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** The user has a keen appreciation for visually appealing and innovative personal care products across all categories, favoring those with modern design and pleasing scents.

Overall, the user profile underscores an ongoing exploration of effective, stylish, and sensory-oriented personal care solutions, contributing to a holistic self-care regimen.
